message.content:
cs.IT, cs.COMM, cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.CC

Reasoning: The paper deals with the design of polar codes for communication systems, which falls under the information theory (cs.IT) and communication (cs.COMM) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the use of successive cancellation (SC) decoder, which is a common technique in system and control theory (cs.SY). The paper also involves simulations, which could fall under the data structures (cs.DS) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the design of rate-compatible codes, which could fall under the computer communications (cs.CC) sub-category.
